General.Name: Spod Lithium Corp.
General.Description: Spod Lithium Corp., a mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company holds a 100% interest in the Golden Moon property located in Quebec. It also holds an option to acquire 100% interests in the Byron Pegmatite, Barbara, and Ferdinand properties situated in Ontario; and the Lithium Grande 4 property located in Quebec. The company was formerly known as EEE Exploration Corp. and changed its name to Spod Lithium Corp. in September 2022. Spod Lithium Corp. was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
